articles.author: Bill McLoughlin
articles.title: Britons vow to boycott EU as companies threaten to abandon UK in Brexit revenge plot - Express
articles.description: BRITONS have vowed to boycott EU products following the latest threats from European companies to leave the UK in a bitter plot to exploit Britain.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: US to restrict travel from India to curb COVID-19 spread - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: United States joins countries from Europe to Asia in limiting travel from India as cases surge, new variants emerge.
articles.content: The United States will restrict travel from India starting from May 4, the White House said on Friday, citing a devastating rise in COVID-19 cases in the country and the emergence of potentially dang… [+3856 chars]
